meanings.definition: Having reached a more advanced or mature stage.
meanings.sent1: The child showed a developed understanding of the story.
meanings.sent2: The city had many developed buildings and roads.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked so developed that it could almost talk!
meanings.sent4: Her skills in painting have developed into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's theory was so developed, it amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: Elaborated or evolved from a simple form.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting was very developed with intricate details.
meanings.sent2: The plan was well-developed and thought out.
meanings.sent3: The joke was so developed that it took a while for everyone to get it.
meanings.sent4: Her developed style of writing captivated the readers.
meanings.sent5: The garden was beautifully developed with various flowers and plants.

meanings.definition: To cause to grow or expand.
meanings.sent1: She developed her business by opening new branches.
meanings.sent2: The company developed a new product to meet customer demands.
meanings.sent3: The idea to have a pet elephant quickly developed into a joke.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music developed into a successful career.
meanings.sent5: The storm developed quickly, surprising everyone.
